org.ametiste.metrics

Interface MetricsAggregator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregationActivator, BootMetricServiceAggregator, DumbAggreagator, JmxMetricAggregator, MockMetricsAggregator, NullMetricsAggregator, RequestScopedMetricsAggregator, StatsDMetricAggregator

    public interface MetricsAggregator
    Single endpoint of metrics aggregation which goals and work principles highly depend on implementation
    Since:
    0.1.0
